location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Covering letter enclosing for the Resident's attention, a further petition (folios 13v-14) from Bukshee Khanum, widow of the late Aga Mohamed Bebahnee, addressed to the Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, dated 12 December 1819. The letter relates to a claim upon property against the widow of Aga Mohamed Babahnee, that has not been resolved after ten years.
